entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning this evening and ending overnight then 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then cloudy. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023
